DEMO_220_MSG_020: ́Did you actually defeat Bundold!? Did you see that Reactor laying around here as well?
DEMO_220_MSG_100:
́Speaking of which, what's your game plan from here on?
ā
DEMO_220_MSG_030: ́Ah, crap! The Reactor's in a hundred pieces! I'm going to need to fix that right away!
DEMO_220_MSG_110:
́If you're thinking of heading to the Grim Tundra, you'll want to head around to the back of this building.
ā
DEMO_220_MSG_040:
́This is the Reactor, no doubt! It's exactly what I've been searching for!
ā
DEMO_220_MSG_120: ́There's a Transport Device waiting there that should be able to send you over to the Grim Tundra!
DEMO_220_MSG_050:
́I'm guessing we can bring this back to the Centre Building and connect it to one of the machines there to use the legendary program.
ā
DEMO_220_MSG_060: ́Well, then scrap that "fixing it" idea! We need to get it back there immediately and try it out!
DEMO_220_MSG_070:
́Oh, how rude! I forgot to thank you! You certainly helped me find what I was after!
ā
DEMO_220_MSG_080: ́What I found on here is a rather special program for use by Monster Masters like yourself!
DEMO_220_MSG_090: ́Heh heh heh... meet me at the Centre Building and I'll teach you how to use it.
